com.android.volley.cache

Class DiskLruBasedCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.volley.cache.DiskLruBasedCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache

    public class DiskLruBasedCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cache
    Cache implementation that caches files directly onto the hard disk in the specified directory using DiskLruCache

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DiskLruBasedCache.ImageCacheParams
      A holder class that contains cache parameters.

      • getCacheFolder

        public java.io.File getCacheFolder()

      • initDiskCache

        public void initDiskCache()
        Initializes the disk cache. Note that this includes disk access so this should not be executed on the main/UI thread. By default an ImageCache does not initialize the disk cache when it is created, instead you should call initDiskCache() to initialize it on a background thread.

      • hashKeyForDisk

        public static java.lang.String hashKeyForDisk(java.lang.String key)
        A hashing method that changes a string (like a URL) into a hash suitable for using as a disk filename.

      • getFileForKey

        public java.io.File getFileForKey(java.lang.String key)
        Returns a file object for the given cache key.
